name: Shadowcrawl
description: With multiple endings, main/side-questlines, unlockable content, hundreds of unique enemies, deep character building, a comprehensive lore, highly adaptive diffuclty, factions & MUCH more, Shadowcrawl is a roguelike that is like no other.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: On Board Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: On Board Storage: 100 MB available space
